pkgmetadata.longdescription:
English natural language parser for numbers.
* Parse 'five' to return 5 * Parse 'seven hundred and fifty two billion, four hundred and twenty million, sixty thousand and forty two' to return 752,420,060,042 * Parse 'siebenundzwanzig' to have it fail because it doesn't recognise German.
Recognises numbers in the trillions.
